review: I was very apprehensive when I had to change Doctors due to certain issues. I feel we found the right Dr in Dr. Shilpa Dinesh as she is very patient in hearing our issues and providing crisp advices on how to handle situations related to our baby. She is very approachable and friendly and displays her knowledge with a down to earth attitude. Happy to say that we found a doctor who is really helpful and caring!
